text: How do people here celebrate finishing large projects? I just finished a year long project where I was lead. I thought I would feel like superman after it but just feel like any other day.

elements.text: How do people here celebrate finishing large projects? I just finished a year long project where I was lead. I thought I would feel like superman after it but just feel like any other day.

text: Tell someone close to you and celebrate by doing something nice together

elements.text: Tell someone close to you and celebrate by doing something nice together

text: Ideally I would be going to see my family now. But I can't due to travel restrictions :disappointed:

elements.text: Ideally I would be going to see my family now. But I can't due to travel restrictions

text: Ok I didn't want to bum people out. Perhaps I should buy something special, never tried retail therapy before.

elements.text: Ok I didn't want to bum people out. Perhaps I should buy something special, never tried retail therapy before.

text: Treat yourself to a nice dinner or take at home dinner from a good restaurant!

elements.text: Treat yourself to a nice dinner or take at home dinner from a good restaurant!

text: Don't tell my mom but I think I'll have a good steak :smile:

elements.text: Don't tell my mom but I think I'll have a good steak

text: Buy a cake, bring it to the kitchen @ work, invite everybody, serve them telling each one what they did for the project, however minor/tangential --- It works! :-))

elements.text: Buy a cake, bring it to the kitchen @ work, invite everybody, serve them telling each one what they did for the project, however minor/tangential --- It works! :-))

text: Was gonna say yea, get some nice food and take a nap or something. Add it to your resume while you still feel good about it. Go up to your boss and be like "I am the best give me promotions now"

elements.text: Was gonna say yea, get some nice food and take a nap or something. Add it to your resume while you still feel good about it. Go up to your boss and be like "I am the best give me promotions now"

text: Just kidding on the last one, but congratulations!

elements.text: Just kidding on the last one, but congratulations!

text: they already promoted me on the speculation of this project. Things happening out of order take the fun out of them

text: <@U01R0NYA8F9> I would do that if we were in office :disappointed:
